topic.title: Teams
topic.p: Inside organizations, you can create teams for grouping users around dedicated projects. Here are some basic advantages of using teams:

list.li: You can combine several projects under a single team to provide a convenient way for navigation.
You can share specific projects among Qodana Cloud users that are part of a team.

topic.note: You cannot create teams in your private organization.
topic.p: To create a team, in the upper-right corner of the organization page click Create team.
After clicking, the New team dialog window will open.
After creating, you can get access to the team from the left sidebar of the Qodana Cloud UI.
Based on the existing team, you can create new projects associated with it.
To manage team members, click the upper-right corner of the team and select Invite members. If you wish to delete (archive) the team, click Archive team.
